/**
 * Define the common styles shared for button and chip
 * @module "js/buttonStyles"
 */const ACCENT_CAUTION='accent-caution';// Define the map from button type to CSS class
const buttonStyles={base:'base-button',accent:'base-button',//only applicable for selection chip
caution:'caution',sole:ACCENT_CAUTION,positive:'positive',negative:'negative',chromeless:'chromeless','accent-high-contrast':'accent-highContrast','accent-mid-contrast':'accent-midContrast','accent-positive':'accent-positive','accent-caution':ACCENT_CAUTION,'accent-negative':'accent-negative','accent-marketing':ACCENT_CAUTION};/**
 * Get button style, if button type is undefined or not supported, return the style of default type.
 * @param {String} buttonType the button type
 * @param {String} defaultType the default button type.
 * @returns {String} button CSS class
 */export let getButtonStyle=function(buttonType){var btnClass='';if(buttonType&&buttonStyles.hasOwnProperty(buttonType)){btnClass=buttonStyles[buttonType];}return btnClass;};export default{getButtonStyle};
